title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 337 - Disability Retirement For Members Of The New York State And Local Employees' Retirement System Under Article 15 Of The Retirement And Social Security Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 337 - Disability Retirement For Members Of The New York State And Local Employees' Retirement System Under Article 15 Of The Retirement And Social Security Law

§ 337.1 - Background
§ 337.2 - Procedure for processing disability retirement
§ 337.3 - Effective date of disability retirement
§ 337.4 - Disability determinations
§ 337.5 - Recovery of disability beneficiaries
§ 337.6 - Reemployment of disability beneficiaries
§ 337.7 - Final salary
§ 337.8 - Reinstatement of member accounts upon restoration to membership

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 337

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§102, 605, 613-b, 614

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
